wordGroup: double taxation [经]双重征税；[经]重复课税
avoidance of double taxation 避免双重课税
international taxation 国际税收；国际税法
taxation treatment 课税处理方法

sentences.en: Their policies on taxation didn't endear them to voters.
sentences.cn: 他们的税收政策并没使他们受到选民的欢迎。

sentences.en: The party is offering low taxation as its main enticement.
sentences.cn: 这个党正提出低税收，以此作为其主要的诱人举措。

sentences.en: Taxation is not popular in principle, merely acceptable in context.
sentences.cn: 征税原则上不受大众欢迎，只是联系背景看是可接受的。
